mapper.sql:
RAL.ID , RAL.user_id AS USERID, RM.USERNAME AS USERNAME, RAL.TOTAL, RAL.MONEY, RAL.USE_MONEY, (SELECT VALUE FROM rocky_configuration RC2 WHERE RAL.TYPE = RC2.name AND RC2.TYPE = 1) AS TYPE, RAL.NO_USE_MONEY, RAL.COLLECTION, RAL.REMARK, RAL.ADDTIME, RAL.ADDIP, RAL.TO_USER, RAL.E_USE_MONEY, RAL.E_FREEZE_MONEY, RAL.E_COLLECTION,
RAL.ID_TYPE, (case WHEN RAL.ID_TYPE = 0 THEN RAL.BORROW_ID WHEN RAL.ID_TYPE = 1 THEN RAL.BORROW_ID WHEN RAL.ID_TYPE = 2 THEN (SELECT rbt.BORROW_ID FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord rbt WHERE rbt.ID = RAL.BORROW_ID ) ELSE RAL.BORROW_ID END ) AS BORROW_ID, (case WHEN RAL.ID_TYPE = 0 THEN RAL.borrow_name WHEN RAL.ID_TYPE = 1 THEN (SELECT tfb.NAME FROM t_first_borrow tfb WHERE tfb.ID = RAL.BORROW_ID) WHEN RAL.ID_TYPE = 2 THEN (SELECT rb.NAME FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord rbt INNER JOIN rocky_borrow rb ON rbt.BORROW_ID = rb.ID WHERE rbt.ID = RAL.BORROW_ID ) ELSE RAL.borrow_name END ) AS borrow_name,
RAL.FIRST_BORROW_USE_MONEY, M.USERNAME AS TO_USERNAME, RAL.NO_DRAW_MONEY, RAL.DRAW_MONEY, RAL.IS_CUSTODY
mapper.select: select COUNT(RAL.user_id) FROM rocky_accountlog RAL LEFT JOIN rocky_member RM ON RAL.user_id = RM.id LEFT JOIN rocky_member M ON RAL.TO_USER = M.id where 1=1

select
FROM rocky_accountlog RAL LEFT JOIN rocky_member RM ON RAL.user_id = RM.id LEFT JOIN rocky_member M ON RAL.TO_USER = M.id where 1=1
ORDER BY RAL.ID DESC

select RAL.user_id AS USERID, RM.USERNAME AS USERNAME, RAL.TOTAL, RAL.MONEY, RAL.USE_MONEY, RC2.VALUE AS TYPE, RAL.NO_USE_MONEY, RAL.COLLECTION, RAL.REMARK, RAL.ADDTIME, RAL.ADDIP, RAL.TO_USER, RAL.BORROW_ID, RAL.BORROW_NAME, RAL.FIRST_BORROW_USE_MONEY, M.USERNAME AS TO_USERNAME, RAL.NO_DRAW_MONEY, RAL.DRAW_MONEY, RAL.e_use_money, RAL.e_freeze_money, RAL.e_collection, RAL.IS_CUSTODY FROM rocky_accountlog RAL LEFT JOIN rocky_member RM ON RAL.user_id = RM.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM rocky_configuration RC WHERE RC.TYPE = 1) AS RC2 ON RAL.TYPE = RC2.name LEFT JOIN rocky_member M ON RAL.TO_USER = M.id where 1=1
ORDER BY RAL.ID DESC

select
FROM rocky_accountlog RAL LEFT JOIN rocky_member RM ON RAL.user_id = RM.id LEFT JOIN rocky_member M ON RAL.TO_USER = M.id where 1=1 AND RAL.ID =#{accountId} ORDER BY RAL.ID DESC
